main event: A bright light object was observed near Bakersfield, California on 6 April 1955.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a dime held at arm's length and blinked 'like a star',The observation lasted approximately 15 minutes without any sound,The sighting was made through a wire screen,Witness Edith J. Coy noted this was her second sighting of a similar object in the area within six months,At the time of the sighting, planet Jupiter was high in the southwestern sky.
sighted object: one bright light in the sky
witness description: Mrs. Edith J. Coy, 40 years old
